TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TrackingParameters extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Contains information about the workflow instance associated with a . This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
The runtime tracking infrastructure passes a TrackingParameters object in when it calls <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetTrackingChannel%2A> on a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>. You can use these parameters in your tracking service to associate tracking data received on the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> with a specific workflow instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public TrackingParameters (Guid instanceId, Type workflowType, System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity rootActivity, System.Collections.Generic.IList<string> callPath, Guid callerInstanceId, Guid contextGuid, Guid callerContextGuid, Guid callerParentContextGuid);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Guid instanceId, class System.Type workflowType, class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity rootActivity, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<string> callPath, valuetype System.Guid callerInstanceId, valuetype System.Guid contextGuid, valuetype System.Guid callerContextGuid, valuetype System.Guid callerParentContextGuid) cil managed

Docs.param: The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.
The <xref:System.Type> of the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.
The root of the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.

A list of strings, each of which represents the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName%2A> of an activity in the call chain of the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel. Currently, only the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName%2A> of the activity that invoked the workflow instance is included in the list.
The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow that has called the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.
A number that identifies the of the root activity of the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.
A number that identifies the of the activity that invoked the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.
A number that identifies the parent of the activity that invoked the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The constructor is called by the runtime tracking infrastructure.

Docs.summary: Gets the context ID of the caller activity.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.Guid> that contains the context ID of the caller .

Docs.summary: Gets the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance that called the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.
Docs.value: The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance that called the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.

Docs.summary: Gets the context ID of the caller's parent activity.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.Guid> that contains the context ID of the caller's parent .

Docs.summary: Gets a list of strings, each of which represents the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName%2A> of an activity in the call chain of the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.
Docs.value: A list of strings, each of which represents the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName%2A> of an activity in the call chain of the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Currently, only the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName%2A> of the activity that invoked the workflow instance is included in the list.

Docs.summary: Gets the context ID of the associated activity.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.Guid> that contains the context ID of the .

Docs.summary: Gets the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.
Docs.value: The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.

Docs.summary: Gets the root activity of the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.
Docs.value: An that represents the root activity of the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.

Docs.summary: Gets the <xref:System.Type> of the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.
Docs.value: The <xref:System.Type> of the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel.
